info.name: Squoval_var
info.description:
In 2017 I began a search to develop parametric equations for a rounder rect. This is the 2023 iteration. 
     x = erf atanh cos t
     y = erf atanh sin t
This shape has 4 differentially flat sides like a square and C-∞ continuity like a circle.
